code: var colorWithRandomHue=function colorWithRandomHue(){var hue=360*Math.random();return'hsl('+hue+', 100%, 75%)';};var colorLightWithRandomHue=function colorLightWithRandomHue(){var hue=360*Math.random();return'hsl('+hue+', 80%, 75%)';};var randomLightColor=function randomLightColor(){var r=128+127*Math.random();var g=128+127*Math.random();var b=128+127*Math.random();return'rgb('+r+', '+g+', '+b+')';};var colorMethods={colorWithRandomHue:colorWithRandomHue,colorLightWithRandomHue:colorLightWithRandomHue,randomLightColor:randomLightColor};export default colorMethods;
